message: I keep my distance and follow.
I'm gripping my phone at the unusual vibe.
When I peered into the next car from the closed door of the connecting section...
I doubted my own eyes, not for a moment.
What the hell is she doing?
I was supposed to play with you after this matter was over.
I don't remember raising my wife to be like that.
Just because the trauma has faded, doesn't mean you've shed a layer too much.
The moment I tried to open the door in anger...
Chihiro met my gaze as if to stop my movement.
Something intense communicated from her eyes.
Indeed, the finger on the doorknob froze beautifully.
An expression clearly aware of my presence.
You've been observing for several days to see what I was up to.
And this is the judgment you've made as a result?
You found the molestation site when you searched my computer.
Of course, the lustful bureaucrat's number is registered in Chihiro's phone.
It's easy to seduce him if you're his wife.
The molestation group would say yes in a heartbeat, too.
Don't look at me with those eyes.
You want to say that, don't you?
Why are you trying to help me?
There's nothing in it for you.
Is it also for your beloved husband?
Either way, you're reaching too far.
The wife properly chose and grabbed the lustful bureaucrat's penis.
I don't like you doing things on your own.
Don't swallow it even if it gets in your mouth.
That's only when I permit it.
If you take it easy, your breasts will be fondled.
Rub, rub, rub, rub, rub, rub, rub, rub...
The train arrives at the station, the doors open.
While wiping off the semen, she dashed onto the platform.
It all happened in a few seconds.
Not even giving them time to put away their penises.
I squeezed my body through the gap of the closing door.
I tumbled onto the platform, struggling.
She headed towards the stairs with incredible speed.
But I'm not in a rush.
After all, there's only one place she's heading to.
The place that led me to discover your peculiar habit.
